ovdesc.p: This table enables definition of charges for clients (non banks)
Charges can be defined for both debit and credit parties based on the direction of the message.

desc.p: If this flag is set to Y against a particular Fee type then that Fee will always be taken if evaluated for a
particular payment. Both conditional and unconditional fees can be marked as �Always apply�. When a conditional
fee is marked so, then fee will be applied always if the condition is first met, if the condition is not met,
then fee is not applied though the flag is set. For example, Phone confirmation fee is applied only if client has
chosen for phone confirmation. In brief, this flag should be understood as �Include fee type always for
unconditional fees and for conditional, include if condition is met�. In the table below always apply flag
for Transaction Fee and Service Fee is set as Y which means that both these components should always be applied.
Possible Values:
Y
N
Any fee type with this flag set, then, only this Fee type should be applied and rest of the fee type should be ignored
except where Always apply flag is set as Y. When processing a payment, fee component may come up with 4 different charges
to be applied. Each charge will be included or calculated depending on the ranking associated with it. When a fee
with �Apply me only� flag is set to YES, it would mean the rest of the charges can be ignored (except where always apply flag is set as Yes)
Possible Values:
Y
N
Unique ID to identify the Client Charges Fee Type
Client charges ID can be linked with multiple records in this table
Specifies the fee type which will be applied. Mandatory field.
Should be a valid value in PPT.FEETYPE
System generated id
Fee amount can be a fixed amount or can be a percentage of the transaction amount
To specify that the fee should be a percentage of the transaction amount, specify the % in this field
Determines the order in which the fee needs to be evaluated. Higher the rank, higher the priority.
Value 1 (Rank 1) will get the highest priority
Mandatory field
